column4: You might find partimage or the imaging stuff in parted/gparted a bit more manageable.
gparted does whole partition backups with compression?
My bad.  Gparted won't, but partimage will.

If you are (or plan to) use dd to also image NTFS partitions, use ntfsclone instead.  dd images of ntfs partitions will often not work if put on a drive of different geometry, use it on a leap year, anger god, get up on the wrong side of the bed, etc.
